49.eng-name: The Description of the Prophet, may Allah Bless Him and Grant Him Peace
49.ara-name: كتاب صفة النبى صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Yahya related to me from Malik from Abdullah ibn Dinar from 'Abdullah ibn 'Umar that the Messenger of Allah, may Allah bless him and grant him peace, used to wear a gold ring. Then the Messenger of Allah, may Allah bless him and grant him peace, stood up and threw it away and said, "I will never wear it." He said, "So the people threw away their rings
